cnbc.summary: The firm said its estimate of additional expenses for companies is probably conservative.

cnbc.title: John Bolton indicted; ex-national security advisor is latest Trump foe to face criminal charges
cnbc.summary: FBI agents on Aug. 22 raided John Bolton's Maryland home and office in Washington, D.C., as part of a criminal investigation.

cnbc.title: U.S. budget deficit edged lower in 2025 as tariffs, debt payments both saw new records
cnbc.summary: The federal government managed to escape with a $1.78 trillion shortfall, some $41 billion, or 2.2%, less than fiscal 2024.

cnbc.title: Marc Benioff's call for troops in SF leads tech investor Ron Conway to leave Salesforce Foundation board
cnbc.summary: Prominent startup investor Ron Conway has left the board of the Salesforce Foundation following comments Marc Benioff made in support of President Trump.

cnbc.title: Trump announces efforts to expand access to IVF drugs
cnbc.summary: The procedure is often not fully covered by insurance — if covered at all — and the costs for accessing it can cost around $20,000 or more per cycle.

cnbc.title: Bill to fund military during government shutdown fails in Senate procedural vote
cnbc.summary: Democrats largely voted against the bill to fund the Pentagon amid the shutdown. The vote came hours after a Senate bill to fund the entire government failed.

cnbc.title: United Airlines CEO warns an extended shutdown will hurt bookings
cnbc.summary: Delta's CEO last week also warned a prolonged shutdown could affect the airline.

cnbc.title: Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker won $1.4 million gambling last year, tax filings show
cnbc.summary: Pritzker has become a leading antagonist of President Donald Trump over federal immigration operations in Chicago and elsewhere.

cnbc.summary: Sky-high credit card rates won't come down much, even as the Federal Reserve lowers its benchmark.
